# Navigating The Client List

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/navigating-the-client-list/

## Category
04 Clients

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
CLIENTS
CLIENT LIST
Navigating the Client List

In the Clients app, you can add new clients, search for existing clients, and view client details including contact information and client notes.

Link copied
Filtering the client list

To filter the client list, select Options. Update the filters as needed and select Apply. To reset the filters, select Reset to default filters.

Link copied
Sorting the client list

To sort the client list alphabetically, go to User Profile > Preferences and select Edit.

In the dropdown, select Alphabetical and select Save.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.

© Mangomint, Inc. All rights reserved.
